scripts.deploy: astro build && npm run deploy:gh-pages && npm run deploy:surge
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: cp -r dist/* docs && cp {.nojekyll,CNAME,manifest.webmanifest} docs && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages" && git push && git status
scripts.reminder: echo; echo 'Reminder: Do you need to \033[1;34m[skip ci]\033[0m?'; echo;
